org.cougaar.core.agent
Interface AgentContainer

All Known Implementing Classes:
AgentManager
public interface AgentContainer

The AgentContainer manages all agents on the node.

Method Detail

containsAgent

boolean containsAgent(MessageAddress agentId)
Equivalent to (getAgentDescription(agentId) != null)

Returns:
true if the agent is on the local node

getAgentAddresses

java.util.Set getAgentAddresses()
Equivalent to getLocalAgentDescriptions().keySet()

Returns:
a Set of all local agent MessageAddresses

getAgentDescription

ComponentDescription getAgentDescription(MessageAddress agentId)
Equivalent to getLocalAgentDescriptions().get(agentId)

Returns:
null if the agent is not on the local node, or the description is not known.

getAgents

java.util.Map getAgents()
Get an unmodifiable map of local agent MessageAddress to the ComponentDescriptions.

Returns:
a Map<MessageAddress><ComponentDescriptions> for the local agents

getComponents

java.util.List getComponents()

addAgent

void addAgent(MessageAddress agentId)
Add a new agent to the local node.

addAgent

void addAgent(MessageAddress agentId,
              StateTuple tuple)
deprecated, use one of the above "addAgent" method.

add

boolean add(java.lang.Object o)
Add a component to this agent container. Only certain components are allowed using this method. In particular, agents cannot be added.

removeAgent

void removeAgent(MessageAddress agentId)
Remove an agent that's on the local node.

Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - if the agent is not on the local node, or it can't be removed.

remove

boolean remove(java.lang.Object o)
Remove component from this agent container. Only components added with the add method can be removed this way. Agents cannot be removed with this method.
